nav.div: Sealy Independent School District » COVID-19 Coronavirus » FAQs

span.style: font-size: 48px;
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: The purpose of this document is to provide guidance and clarification regarding Sealy ISD's efforts to meet the educational needs of all students during this COVID-19 emergency. If at any time you have additional questions please email

span.style: font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span:
.
Sealy ISD Remote Grading Guidelines - Click Here Sealy ISD Remote Learning Family Plan - Click Here

span.style: font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(47, 47, 47);

p.span: MEAL PROGRAM

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(47, 47, 47);

p.span: -Lunch

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(47, 47, 47);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(47, 47, 47);

p.span: will be available

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(47, 47, 47);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(47, 47, 47);

p.span: -Meals for children 18 years and younger (must be present) available for pick up at Selman Elementary (regardless of which campus the student attends)

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(47, 47, 47);

p.span: -Drive-Thru only Selman Elementary car rider loop (original entrance, not the church street entrance)

span.style: font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(47, 47, 47);

p.span: HOW WILL OUR SCHOOL CALENDAR BE AFFECTED?

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(47, 47, 47);

p.span: The Texas Education Agency has provided guidance to school districts noting that minutes will be waived for this school year. At this time, we do not feel that the school year will be extended into the summer. We expect more guidance from the state in weeks to come. Additionally, all STAAR and EOC testing has been waived. I realize some additional questions come with this information; however, we are early in this process and the state is working through details.

span.style: font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(47, 47, 47);

p.span: WILL MY CHILD HAVE TO TAKE THE STAAR TEST THIS SPRING?

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(47, 47, 47);

p.span: No. All state testing requirements have been suspended for this school year.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: INSTRUCTIONAL SUPPORT AND RESOURCES

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span:
Please see the Instructional Support Page for Sealy ISD’s plan to continue instruction. You can also scroll down and see a list of extension activities available to provide additional educational supports.
SPECIAL EDUCATION SERVICES Students will still receive special education and 504 services during these school closures. Details are still being worked out for specific services and they may need to be modified to allow staff to provide the best support possible given constraints that exist in delivery or instructional services. If you have questions regarding these services please email smagee@sealyisd.com.

span.style: font-family: Arial;
font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

span.span: GOOGLE CLASSROOM GUIDE FOR PARENTS

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

span.span: Please see the following video to help explain how Google Classroom works.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: MEDICATION PICK UP

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: The campus nurses will begin contacting parents about picking up student medications. If you need to pick up your child’s medicines from the school, please

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: email your campus nurse directly so that they can schedule a time.

span.style: font-family: Arial;
background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: 700; text-decoration-line: underline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: TEACHER CONTACT INFORMATION

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: All teachers will be checking their school email addresses. All staff email addresses are first initial, last name @ sealyisd.com. Example: Jane Smith = jsmith@sealyisd.com. You can find a complete list of teachers on the campus websites under the staff directory.

span.style: font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: EXEMPTIONS

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Exemptions will be discussed at a later time. These COVID school closure dates will not affect exemptions.

span.style: font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: GRADUATION

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: There are no current plans to change Graduation. We will keep you updated if the state extends current school closures. Remember, together we can “flatten the curve” and get life back to “normal".

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: GT ASSESSMENT RESULTS

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: When will gifted and talented spring assessment results be communicated to families? Per TEA guidance, GT screening is currently on hold until all the assessment results can be collected and compiled for the District GT Committee to meet and discuss. The district is hopeful to get the results communicated via mail in May or early summer. If a student qualifies for services and they were screened this spring, they will not begin services until August 2020.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 21pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(30, 30, 30);

p.span: Family Resources Local Resources to Families in Need

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 16pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(30, 30, 30);

p.span: Connectivity / Resources for Internet Access

span.style: background-color: transparent; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 20px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(30, 30, 30);
font-family: Arial;
font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

span.span: (Bobby Schoelman) has reached out to Sealy ISD and offered to help support our efforts to help those who might need assistance with internet access options. Please contact them a

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

span.span: t

font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

span.span: to see how they might be able to help meet your needs.

span.style: font-family: Arial;
font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

span.span: stating that providers will waive late fees, not cutoff service for lack of payment, and open hot-spots.

span.style: font-family: Arial;
font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

span.span: : offers free WiFi for 2 months to low-income families plus all Xfinity hot-spots are free to the public during this time

span.style: font-family: Arial;
font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

a.span: Charter Free Internet offer for 2 months

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Charter will offer free Spectrum broadband and Wi-Fi access for 60 days to households with K-12 and/or college students who do not already have a Spectrum broadband subscription and at any service level up to 100 Mbps. To enroll call

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);
font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: . Installation fees will be waived for new student households.

span.style: font-family: Arial;
font-family: Arial;

font-size: 12pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);

span.span: offers open hot-spots, unlimited data to existing customers, and $10/month plans to low-income families

div.h5: Sealy ISD does not discriminate because of race, age, color, national origin, sex or disability.
